mvc

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • mvc.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the class contaning the logic of the program. It responds to events send by the view (MainWindow) and ask the Model to update the view with data.
    Author:
    Hubert Lemelin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.io.File file
      The current file selected by the user.
      protected javax.swing.JFileChooser fileChooser
      A JFileChooser used to ask the file to open.
      protected java.lang.String filename
      Current filename of the file being parser.
      protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metricDetails
      Associates each elements of Metrics.METRICS to a description.
      protected Model model
      The model (hardcoded to save time).
      protected MainWindow view
      The view (hardcoded to save time).

    • Field Detail

      • model

        protected Model model
        The model (hardcoded to save time).

      • view

        protected MainWindow view
        The view (hardcoded to save time).

      • fileChooser

        protected javax.swing.JFileChooser fileChooser
        A JFileChooser used to ask the file to open.

      • file

        protected java.io.File file
        The current file selected by the user.

      • metricDetails

        protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metricDetails
        Associates each elements of Metrics.METRICS to a description.

      • filename

        protected java.lang.String filename
        Current filename of the file being parser. We do not use file since the use may select another file without parsing the file right away. We do this to avoid clicking on "Create metrics file" of the file currently being parsed but save the metrics file in the wrong directory if the selected file is not in the same directory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller(Model model,
                  MainWindow view)
        Construcrtor.
        Parameters:
        model - Reference to the model.
        view - Reference to the view.

    • Method Detail

      • selectFileButtonClicked

        public void selectFileButtonClicked()
        Called by the view when the select file button is clicked. It then shows a file selecting box.

      • parseButtonClicked

        public void parseButtonClicked()
        Called by the view when the parse button is clicked. The model will now try to parse the file.

      • createMetricsFileButtonClicked

        public void createMetricsFileButtonClicked()
        Called by the view when the create metrics button is clicked. It will create a CSV file containing all the metrics for all the classes.

      • classListClicked

        public void classListClicked()
        Called by the view when the user clicks on a class in the list. It will ask the model to send the information of that class (for example, the model will send the list of attributes, operations, ...)

      • associationListClicked

        public void associationListClicked()
        Called by the view when the user clicks on an association. It asks the model to send the substring in the file corresponding to the selected association.

      • aggregationListClicked

        public void aggregationListClicked()
        Called by the view when the user clicks on an aggregation. It asks the model to send the substring in the file corresponding to the selected aggregation.

      • metricListClicked

        public void metricListClicked()
        Called by the view when the user clicks on a metric. It sends to the view the description of the selected metric.

      • multipleInheritanceCheckBoxClicked

        public void multipleInheritanceCheckBoxClicked()
        Called by the view when the user checks/unchecks the allow multiple inheritance checkbox.

      • quoteString

        protected java.lang.String quoteString(java.lang.String string)
        Puts a string between quotes for the generation of the CSV file.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to be quoted. It is assumed that it does not contain quotes.
        Returns:
        The quoted string.
